projects

Woodbridge School

During the summer we carried out extensive works at Woodbridge High School in Essex.

The main reception works covered full rip out, structural alterations and a Refurbishment that covered new flooring, FD30 doorsets, glazed Security screens and suspend ceiling works along with new fire rated partitions to form new reception and student entrance.

In the Head teachers Office we carried out. Conversion of a dated shower and wc area into a small kitchen and newly positioned Wc room. New partitions and FD30 doorsets were fitted. We carried out flooring works, plumbing works and suspended ceilings. The main office area was fully decorated along with cable and pipe boxing in works and new flooring.

In the deputy heads room we fitted over 30 metres of pipework and waste pipes to fit a Butlerâ€™s sink to an old cupboard that was turned into a small kitchen area. We also build a fire rated plasterboard cupboard with a new FD30 doorset.

In the large canteen area we infilled 2 openings to block off one section that we turned into a new meeting room. We also carried out partition works to form a store room in the area. A new kitchen complete with full plumbing services was fitted.

We carried out various sign fitting works around the school and replaced old fascias with new upvc ones.
